The shots all hit Train Wreck. He laughed.

Train Wreck: You are so foolish=
. My thick armor cannot be pierced so easily, especially by rapid fire shot=
s.

Train Wreck raised the cannon. A huge, ugly monstrosity, and fired one =
very large blast at Windlord...

gainst Train Wreck

ega

    Deemos looks up in shock=
 as the 8 blasts rain down upon him. He was hit by
    every one of them. H=
e cringes and shudders.

    Deemos: You coward, you fire at me? You dare f=
ire at me when we were having
    close combat? You lowly coward!

    Deem=
os stepped backwards, then turned and ran for a rock, meaning to use it
   =
 as his shield from future blasts...

    ----- Original Message -----
    =
From: <Rudra656@...>
    To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
    Sent: Tuesday=
, May 29, 2001 10:30 PM
    Subject: Re: War at Chivtron's Base!!!


    > =
::Aerotaur::
    >     He stiffened at the voice behind him.  But only for =
an instant.  He
    then
    > shot up higher into the sky.  The blast catc=
hes his left knee blowing his
    > lower leg off.  He howls in pain.  "WIN=
DLORD!  TAKE HIM OUT!"  He flies
    > higher unable to land.  Mech fluid g=
ushes from his leg.  He opens another
    > eight shot barrage at Deemos.
